snippet: For the second straight Olympics, Liu Xiang, the first Chinese man to win a gold medal in track, failed to clear a single hurdle because of injury.
abstract: Chinese hurdler Liu Xiang, the first Chinese man to win a gold medal in track, fails to finish his first heat because of injury for the second straight Olympics.

byline.contributor: Jacob Fromer contributed reporting from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: For the second straight Olympics, Liu Xiang, the first Chinese man to win a gold medal in track, failed to clear a single hurdle because of injury.

headline.seo: Another Early Exit for China’s Liu Xiang
headline.main: For Chinese Hurdler, an Achilles’ Heel Again Lives Up to Its Name
headline.print_headline: For Chinese Hurdler, An Achilles’ Heel Again Lives Up to Its Name
